verses.text: Behold, how good and how pleasant \add it is\add* For brethren to dwell together in unity.
\add It is\add* like the precious ointment upon the head, That ran down upon the beard, \add even\add* Aaronâ€™s beard: That went down to the skirts of his garments;
As the dew of Hermon, \add and as the dew\add* that descended upon the mountains of Zion: For there the \sc Lord\sc* commanded the blessing, \add Even\add* life for evermore.
